translations: 束缚（manacle 的三单形式）；给……带上手铐

sentences.sentence: They're manacles that confine the vulnerable and tender flesh of the body.
sentences.translation: 它们是束缚脆弱柔软的血肉之躯的镣铐。

sentences.sentence: A third time he freed himself of his manacles.
Germany's leaders will handle all this wearing fiscal manacles.
sentences.translation: 德国领导人将手戴枷锁应对这一切。
